lead_paragraph: Soon after returning from his 15-hour hiatus from the platform, he was justifying his loss in the Iowa caucuses and turning it into a success.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: ‘I Don’t Feel Any Pressure,’ Trump Declares at Rally
headline.main: ‘I Don’t Feel Any Pressure,’ Donald Trump Declares at Rally

snippet: Soon after returning from his 15-hour hiatus from the platform, he was justifying his loss in the Iowa caucuses and turning it into a success.
abstract: Donald J Trump appears at New Hampshire rally in his first public appearance following second-place finish in Iowa Republican caucuses; most of his statements to media have somewhat lackluster tone compared to his usual boastfulness, but he relays confidence that he will do better in New Hampshire and feels no new pressure in race.
